title: Guided Meditation For Powerful Positivity ➤ Peace, Focus, & A Positive Mind In 10 Minutes
description:
This 10 minute guided meditation for positivity is the perfect way to welcome peace, focus, and a positive mind. Let go of anxiety, fear and worries and reset with healing energy for productivity and a perfect day. Through the simple act of reconnecting with your inner self, this easy Boho Beautiful guided meditation is perfect for anyone that is needing some positivity and calm during stressful and uncertain times. 

It is time to let go of the negativity, stress, anxiety....whatever is holding you back in your life. Let this guided meditation with Juliana Spicoluk take you on a meditative journey to cleanse and heal yourself from the inside out. 

So find a quiet space, put some headphones on, close your eyes, and enjoy. 

🚨 Check out our NEW youtube channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨 
https://flow.bohobeautiful.life/BohoBeautifulMind-

channelDescription:
Free yoga videos for the digital yogi. 
Specializing in content highlighting fitness, pilates, vegan food, guided meditations and thoughtful blogs for conscious and mindful living. Boho Beautiful is the creation and beating heart of both Juliana and Mark Spicoluk.

If you are new to the Boho Beautiful family, be ready to experience everything from beginner and intermediate to yin, hatha, ashtanga and so much more.


Your Decisions Today Will Define Your Tomorrow.

comments:
🚨 Check out our NEW Youtube Channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨
https://flow.bohobeautiful.life/BohoBeautifulMind

I’ve struggled with depression for 15 years, I’m a father of two little girls and I spent many days unable to give them the best of me. I found your videos about a year ago and they have opened my eyes and mind to be able to begin to rebuild myself. I have been able to repair my marriage with my wife who stuck with me through all my downs. I am able to be the dad I always wanted to be. I wanted to truly thank you for your messages and the work you put into them. They have forever changed my life and helped me become the better version of myself to give to others. Thank you

"Let go of the idea that made you feel small"

Thank you.🙏

My life was spiralling 15 months ago. My husband was dying. My house needed to be sold, I had two children to look after. I decided I had to live and started to look for ways to survive. I found you guys. I’ve meditated every day for 13 months. You, Juliana and Mark have given me strength.
I now am in such a different place. My husband was transplanted and continues to recover, we have a new home to live and breathe in and I have the most loved job. My children and I are happy. We are living a new life with meditation involved in all of our lives. I’ll always be grateful to you both. You have resonated with me on such a level that others haven’t. I’m sending you my love and thanks. Eternally grateful. Keep on being you guys.✨✨✨
I cried listening to you. I've been feeling heavy lately with everything happening around the world. This helped, thank you! <3
